name: Sharp Gunners
description:
<center></center>

Three player strategy/shooter based game. This game is meant to appeal to females because when looking at stats about the types of games each gender play, 96% of tactical shooter games were played by males - Source.

This game is called Sharp Gunners (SG) because, timing your shots will have a greater impact than focusing on firing as many shots as possible.

Key Mapping may vary per device, therefore either the keypad key, NUM 0 or R. Shift may be used to shoot to the right for player three.
